"use client" import "./StudentPollScreen.css" const StudentPollScreen = ({ currentPoll, participants, timer, selectedOption, setSelectedOption, submitVote, isLoading, }) => { return (
Question 1
00:{timer.toString().padStart(2, "0")}
{currentPoll?.question}
{currentPoll?.options.map((option, index) => (
setSelectedOption(index)} >
{String.fromCharCode(65 + index)}
{option}
))}
Participants
Name
{participants.map((participant) => (
{participant.name}
))}
) } export default StudentPollScreen
